data.title: Griffin House Preparatory School
data.meta_description: We have a wide range of teaching and support staff at Griffin House School in Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire. We are an independent school for children 2 1/2 - 11
data.text:
Here are some of the staff with whom your child will have regular contact:
